sentences.sContent: To investigate a fast way of diagnosing typhoid, paratyphoid and typhus with serology agglutinating method.
sentences.sContent_eng: To investigate a fast way of diagnosing typhoid, paratyphoid and typhus with serology agglutinating method.
sentences.sCn: 目的探讨一种诊断伤寒、副伤寒、斑疹伤寒的快速血清学凝集法。

phrases.pCn: 伤寒玛丽（伤寒带菌者）；坏事传播者

trans.tranCn: 伤寒的， 斑疹伤寒症的

trans.tranOther: a serious infectious disease that is caused by dirty food or drink
